headline: Clarivate Plc (CLVT) Appoints Maroun S. Mourad as President of Intellectual Property Division
summary: With a low price-to-earnings multiple and a significant presence in Seth Klarman’s investment portfolio, Clarivate Plc (NYSE:CLVT) earns a spot on our list of the 12 Cheap Value Stocks to Buy Now According to Seth Klarman. On July 30, 2025, Clarivate Plc (NYSE:CLVT) appointed Maroun S. Mourad to the role of President of its Intellectual […]
